SongLyrics.JpnStr: 強[つよ]くなれる理由[りゆう]を知[し]った 僕[ぼく]を連[つ]れて進[すす]め
SongLyrics.EngStr: I learned the reason why I can become stronger, take me and move forward

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 泥[どろ]だらけの走馬灯[そうまとう]に酔[よ]う  強[こわ]張[ば]る心[こころ]
SongLyrics.EngStr: I get drunk on the mud-covered revolving lantern, my heart stiffens

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 震[ふる]える手[て]は掴[つか]みたいものがある 其[そ]れ丈[だけ]さ
SongLyrics.EngStr: There's something I want to grasp with these trembling hands, that's all

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 夜[よる]の匂[にお]いに空[そら]にらんでも
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even if I stare at the scent of the night and the sky

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 変[かわ]っていけるのは自[じ]分[ぶん]自[じ]身[しん]だけ 其[そ]れ丈[だけ]さ
SongLyrics.EngStr: The only one who can change is myself, that's all

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 強[つよ]くなれる理由[りゆう]を知[し]った 僕[ぼく]を連[つ]れて進[す]め
SongLyrics.EngStr: I learned the reason why I can become stronger, take me and move forward

SongLyrics.JpnStr: どうしたって！
SongLyrics.EngStr: No matter what!

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 消[け]せない夢[ゆめ]も 止[と]まれない今[いま]も
SongLyrics.EngStr: The unstoppable dreams, the unending present

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 誰[だれ]かの為[ため]に強[つよ]くなれるなら
SongLyrics.EngStr: If I can become stronger for someone's sake

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ありがとう 悲[かな]しみよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Thank you, sadness

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 世界[せかい]に打[う]ちのめされて負[ま]ける意味[いみ]を知[し]った
SongLyrics.EngStr: I learned the meaning of being beaten by the world

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 紅蓮[ぐれん]の花[はな]は咲[さ]き誇[ほこ]れ！ 運命[うんめい]を照[てら]して
SongLyrics.EngStr: The crimson flower blooms in glory, illuminating destiny

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 稲[いな]光[びかり]の雑音[ざつおん]が耳[みみ]を刺[さ]さす 戸惑[とまど]う心[こころ]
SongLyrics.EngStr: The noise of insecurity pierces my ears, bewildering my heart

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 優[やさ]しいだけじゃ守[まも]れないものがある？ わかってるけど
SongLyrics.EngStr: Is there something that can't be protected by just kindness? I know, but

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 水面下[すいめんか]で絡[から]まる善悪[ぜんあく] 透[す]けて見[み]える偽善[ぎぜん]に天罰[てんばつ]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Good and evil intertwine beneath the surface, divine punishment for transparent hypocrisy

SongLyrics.JpnStr: Tellテル meミー why,ワイ Tellテル meミー why,ワイ Tellテル meミー why......ワイ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Tell me why, tell me why, tell me why... why

SongLyrics.JpnStr: I don't need you
逸材[いつざい]の花[はな]より 挑[ど]み続[つづ]け咲[さ]いた一輪[いちりん]が美[うつく]しい
SongLyrics.EngStr: The single flower that continued to bloom, challenging beyond exceptional talent, is beautiful

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 乱暴[らんぼう]に敷[しき]詰[つめ]られた トゲだらけの道[みち]も
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even the road full of thorns laid out violently

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 本気[ほんき]の僕[ぼく]だけに現[あらわ]れるから 乗[の]り越[こ]えてみせるよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Because it only appears to my serious self, I'll show that I can overcome it

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 簡単[かんたん]に片付[かたづ]けられた 守[まも]れなかった夢[ゆめ]も
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even the dream that couldn't be protected, tidied up easily

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 紅蓮[ぐれん]の心臓[しんぞう]に根[ね]を生[はや]し この血[ち]に宿[やど]ってる
SongLyrics.EngStr: Rooted in the crimson heart, dwelling in this blood

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 人知[ひとし]れず儚[はかな]い 散[ち]りゆく結末[けつまつ]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Fleeting, scattering conclusions

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 無情[むじょう]に破[やぶ]れた 悲鳴[ひめい]の風[かぜ]吹[ふ]かせ
SongLyrics.EngStr: The wind of screams, torn apart mercilessly

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 誰[だれ]かの笑[わら]う影[かげ] 誰[だれ]かの泣[な]き声[ごえ]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Someone's laughing shadow, someone's crying voice

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 誰[だれ]もが幸[しあわ]せを願[ねが]ってる
SongLyrics.EngStr: Everyone wishes for happiness
